    • Method Detail

      • populateMediaList

        public static java.util.List<MediaType> populateMediaList​(java.lang.String movieFileName,
                                                          java.lang.String tvFileName)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Method populates an ArrayList of type MediaType

        NetFlixMovies.json and NetFlixTVShows.json are two strings passed into the method and are split into an array of String between two curly braces { } and added to either a object of type TelevisionShow or Movie and then added to a master List

        Parameters:
        movieFileName - String movieFileName must exist for method to run
        tvFileName - String tvFileName must exist for method to run
        Returns:
        List of type MediaType Master list of all movies and television shows on NetFlix
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be read

      • populateMediaEntry

        public static void populateMediaEntry​(MediaType mediaEntry,
                                      java.lang.String fieldToParseFromJson)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Method populates the object of type MediaType called mediaEntry
        Parameters:
        mediaEntry - mediaEntry is an object of type MediaType representing objects of both Movie and TelevisionShow
        fieldToParseFromJson - fieldToParseFromJson is a String which represents which field is to be parsed and operated on within this method
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if entry cannot be read

      • createActorFromName

        public static Actor createActorFromName​(java.lang.String actor)
                                 throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        This method splits and sets the first name and last name of a Person of type Actor
        Parameters:
        actor - actor is a String parsed from the JSON file, there must exist an object of type Actor
        Returns:
        Actor newActor is an object of type Actor with firstName and lastName
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if array cannot be split

      • createDirectorFromName

        public static Director createDirectorFromName​(java.lang.String director)
                                       throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        This method splits and sets the first name and last name of a Person of type Director
        Parameters:
        director - director is a String parsed from the JSON file there must exist an object of type Director
        Returns:
        Director Director is an object of type Director with firstName and lastName
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if array cannot be split

      • getField

        public static java.lang.String getField​(java.lang.String record,
                                        java.lang.String fieldName)
        Method to process a String set between an open and close constrain set within the logic. Uses StringUtils and StringEscapeUtils to separate String into pieces and to convert any escaped unicode to original characters
        Parameters:
        record - String record is the String being passed in to be separated and processed
        fieldName - String fieldName corresponds to the variable to which the value that is parsed will be assigned inside the object
        Returns:
        String value to be added to the object of type MediaType

      • getFieldArray

        public static java.lang.String[] getFieldArray​(java.lang.String record,
                                               java.lang.String fieldName)
        Method to process a String set between an open and close constrain set within the logic. Uses StringUtils and StringEscapeUtils to separate String into pieces and to convert any escaped unicode to original characters and returns an array of String
        Parameters:
        record - String record is the String being passed in to be separated and processed
        fieldName - String fieldName corresponds to the variable to which the value that is parsed will be assigned inside the object
        Returns:
        String[] An array of string values that are split to be added to the List actors or List directors of type Person

      • getFieldArrayGenre

        public static java.lang.String[] getFieldArrayGenre​(java.lang.String record,
                                                    java.lang.String fieldName)
        Method to process a String set between an open and close constrain set within the logic specifically for genres. Uses StringUtils and StringEscapeUtils to separate String into pieces and to convert any escaped unicode to original characters and returns an array of String

        Method also replaces pluralized categories and replaces them with singular tense as well as removes unnecessary and redundant descriptive words

        Parameters:
        record - String record is the String being passed in to be separated and processed
        fieldName - String fieldName corresponds to the variable to which the value that is parsed will be assigned inside the object
        Returns:
        String[] An array of string values that are split

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Method to read in any file to be parsed by the preceding methods
        Parameters:
        fileName - String fileName representing the name of the file to be passed into the method
        Returns:
        String Returns a String representation of the file that was taken in by the method
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file cannot be read
